content.description: The function f is defined on the open interval 0.4 < x < 2.4 and has first derivative fâ€² given by f'(x) = sin(x2). Which of the following statements are true?
content.question: f has a relative maximum on the interval 0.4 < x < 2.4 f has a relative minimum on the interval 0.4 < x < 2.4 The graph of f has two points of inflection on the interval 0.4 < x < 2.4
